long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a timer which starts it's countdown from 3 minutes default, else you can change the value by pausing the timer and clicking on the digits and enter the value of your choice.

This application was built with the help Colt Steele's course The Modern Javascript Bootcamp Course (2022). 

This extension needs improvements which will be added over the time.

Your feedback is highly appreciated.

Thanks for reading!!
